entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is introduced as a character who is challenging Dumbledore and Harry. He is described as using a commanding tone and being polite.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a wise and authoritative figure. He is described as raising his eyebrows in response to Riddle's challenge.

relationships.description: Riddle challenges Dumbledore, who responds by setting boundaries and expectations for their interaction.
Dumbledore responds to Riddle's challenge by setting boundaries and expectations for their interaction.
